jsx.client
Class Location

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.client.Location

public final class Location
extends Disposable

A utility class accessing the properties of JsWindow.location.

Users are encouraged to use the utilities provided in this class instead of the opaque methods of the JsLocation class in consideration of the reuse benefit for re-compilation results.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

          Determines the protocol of the current location is secure.
